一个简单的MIDI文件解析器

trans-unit.source: A simple Python3 MIDI File / stream parser / decoder
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的Python3 MIDI文件/流解析器/解码器。

trans-unit.source: Class representing a single track from an SMF file, or a collection of MIDI events. MIDI.Track objects are iterable and array-like.
trans-unit.target: 表示SMF文件中的单个轨道或MIDI事件的集合的类。 MIDI.Track对象是可迭代的并且类似于数组。

trans-unit.source: Included in the package is the following simple test script:
trans-unit.target: 软件包中包含以下简单的测试脚本。

trans-unit.source: Instance of a class representing this particular kind of MIDI message; depending on
trans-unit.target: 类的实例,代表这种特殊的MIDI信息;取决于

trans-unit.source: It is known to run on MacOS and Linux. It should run on Windows, but then, nothing is certain when Windows is involved, is it? Attempts to make it run on Windows are at your own risk.
trans-unit.target: 据悉,它可以运行在MacOS和Linux上。它应该可以在Windows上运行,但当涉及到Windows时,没有什么是确定的,不是吗?试图让它在Windows上运行,风险自负。

trans-unit.source: Iterates over the events / messages in the track, in the order in which they appeared.
trans-unit.target: 按照事件/信息出现的顺序,对轨道中的事件/信息进行迭代。

trans-unit.source: Iterates over the tracks in the file
MIDI timestamp for the time of the event’s occurrence, relative to some arbitrary zero.
trans-unit.target: 事件发生时间的MIDI时间戳，相对于任意零。

trans-unit.source: MIDIFile is a pure python module requiring Python 3.6 or later to run (this could be reduced by using more long-winded equivalents to Python 3.6’s
trans-unit.target: MIDIFile是需要python 3.6或更高版本才能运行的纯python模块（可以通过使用与Python 3.6更长的等效语言来减少它

trans-unit.source: Other parameters exist only for specific event kinds as follows:
trans-unit.target: 其他参数只存在于以下特定的事件类型中:

trans-unit.source: Parse the file. Determines the file’s type and populates an array of content tracks, each of which contains one track from the file and is represented by a MIDI.Track instance.
trans-unit.target: 解析文件。确定文件的类型并填充一系列内容轨道，每个内容轨道包含文件中的一个轨道，并由MIDI.Track实例表示。

trans-unit.source: Parse the track into an array of events, ordered based on their appearance in the track. Events are represented by instances of MIDI.Events.Event.
trans-unit.target: 将轨道解析为一系列事件，并根据事件在轨道中的出现顺序进行排序。事件由MIDI.Events.Event的实例表示。

trans-unit.source: Provide information about the track, e.g. lyrics, tempo, etc, are represented by the type MIDI.Events.MetaEvent, which has the following additional properties:
trans-unit.target: 提供有关曲目的信息，例如歌词，速度等，由MIDI.Events.MetaEvent类型表示，该类型具有以下附加属性：

trans-unit.source: Represents a file of Standard Midi Format (SMF) data, as defined by the MIDI Association. MIDI.MIDIFile objects are iterable and array-like.
trans-unit.target: 表示由MIDI Association定义的标准Midi格式（SMF）数据文件。 MIDI.MIDIFile对象是可迭代的并且类似于数组。

trans-unit.source: Represents a general event as found in SMF files, or streams of MIDI messages. Specific kinds of event are represented by subclasses (for which, see below).
trans-unit.target: 代表SMF文件或MIDI信息流中的一般事件。特定类型的事件由子类表示(见下文)。

trans-unit.source: Returns string representations of all the track’s events, concatenated and separated by newline
trans-unit.target: 返回所有轨道事件的字符串表示形式，并用换行符连接和分隔

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of messages in the track (0 if
trans-unit.target: 返回轨道中的信息数量(如果是0,则为0。

trans-unit.source: Specialisations of this class, describing specific kinds of SMF event, offer various dynamically generated read-only properties, describing properties specific to them. This is described below:
trans-unit.target: 该类的特殊化,描述了特定种类的SMF事件,提供了各种动态生成的只读属性,描述了它们的特定属性。下面将对其进行描述。

trans-unit.source: String representation of the event. By default, a representation of the raw bytes as a binary string.
trans-unit.target: 事件的字符串表示。默认情况下,以二进制字符串表示原始字节。

trans-unit.source: Tell MIDI instruments how to perform the track, and are represented by the type MIDI.Events.SysExEvent. Each System event consists of a single MIDI System message. If
trans-unit.target: 告诉MIDI乐器如何执行音轨，并由MIDI.Events.SysExEvent类型表示。每个系统事件都包含一个MIDI系统消息。如果

trans-unit.source: Tell MIDI instruments what to play when performing the track, and are represented by the type MIDI.Events.MIDIEvent. All instances have the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 告诉MIDI乐器演奏曲目时要播放什么，并由MIDI.Events.MIDIEvent类型表示。所有实例均具有以下字段：

trans-unit.source: Text, Copyright_Notice, Track_Name, Instrument_Name, Lyric, Marker, Cue_Point
trans-unit.target: 文本、版权声明、曲目名称、乐器名称、歌词、标记、提示点。

trans-unit.source: The MIDI format of the loaded file. Possible values are
trans-unit.target: 加载文件的MIDI格式。可能的值是

trans-unit.source: The channel that the message relates to. Equal to
trans-unit.target: 信息所涉及的频道。等于

trans-unit.source: The control that should be changed; represented either as a named object, for known controls, or as an unsigned integer for others
trans-unit.target: 应该改变的控件;对于已知控件,可以用命名对象表示,对于其他控件,可以用无符号整数表示。

trans-unit.source: The first few lines of the output from applying this to a SMF file are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 将此方法应用到SMF文件的前几行输出如下。

trans-unit.source: The message command type, as defined in the MIDI Specification v1.0. Equal to
trans-unit.target: 消息命令类型，如MIDI规范v1.0中所定义。等于

trans-unit.source: The new pitch bend for the channel as a signed integer
trans-unit.target: 通道的新节距弯曲是一个有符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: The new pressure value for the channel as an unsigned integer
trans-unit.target: 通道的新压力值为无符号整数。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the control; converted to ON / OFF, etc for known controls, left as an unsigned integer for others
trans-unit.target: 控件的新值；对于已知控件，转换为ON / OFF等，对于其他控件，则保留为无符号整数

trans-unit.source: The note to which the message refers
The number of tracks in the file (0 if
trans-unit.target: 文件中的音轨数(如果为0,则为0。

trans-unit.source: The pressure with which the note is applied
The top-level namespace is MIDI, which contains two classese: MIDI.MIDIFile and MIDI.Track.
trans-unit.target: 顶级名称空间是MIDI，它包含两个类：MIDI.MIDIFile和MIDI.Track。

trans-unit.source: The total length of the event.
The velocity with which the note is applied

This clearly shows the overall structure of the file (with four tracks), the content of the initial metadata track, which specifies tempo, key, etc, and the start of the second track, which mixes MIDI messages specifying what an instrument should play, with metadata providing lyrics, etc.
trans-unit.target: 这清楚地显示了文件的整体结构(有四条轨道),初始元数据轨道的内容,指定了速度、调子等,第二条轨道的开始,混合了MIDI信息,指定了乐器应该演奏的内容,元数据提供了歌词等。

trans-unit.source: Time quantum of the MIDI data encoded in the file (or
trans-unit.target: 编码在文件中的MIDI数据的时间量子(或

trans-unit.source: Useful information about the file as a whole, number of tracks and their sizes
trans-unit.target: 关于整个文件、轨道数量及其大小的有用信息。

trans-unit.source: binary string or array containing the event’s body, i.e. its data content, with the header byte and other formatting removed
trans-unit.target: 包含事件主体（即其数据内容）的二进制字符串或数组，其中已删除标头字节和其他格式

trans-unit.source: consisting of a sequence of one or more raw MIDI events, e.g. captured from an observed MIDI stream, or sent to the application by a MIDI controller.
trans-unit.target: 由一个或多个原始MIDI事件序列组成,例如从观察到的MIDI流中捕获,或由MIDI控制器发送给应用程序。

trans-unit.source: consists of MIDI events interleaved with timestamps (as in an SMF file); False if it is a sequence of MIDI messages
trans-unit.target: 由与时间戳交错的MIDI事件组成（如SMF文件中一样）；如果是MIDI消息序列，则为False

trans-unit.source: data comprising one track from an SMF file, or a sequence of MIDI messages
trans-unit.target: 由SMF文件中的一个音轨或MIDI信息序列组成的数据。

trans-unit.target: 识别标准MIDI时间码格式之一,并表示每秒的帧数。
